name: Coffeescript Title Fix
description:
Fixed floating title for its less obtrusive.
Title is converted to alone logo near left edge of page and full menu if it is hovered.
For http://coffeescript.org/ and analogues ( http://cidocs.ru/coffeescript/ ).
additional_info:
